title: Eccleston Delph Walk Route

images.title: Yu Diving, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Lake view with hills in the backkground

images.title: Yu Diving, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Scuba Diving at Eccleston Delph

description: This walk visits the Eccleston Delph Watersports centre near the village of Eccleston in Lancashire. The centre is mainly for watersports but it's also a nice place for a stroll and a picnic. You can follow a footpath around the lake and look out for the divers, fish and various birds on the water. The site also includes a decent cafe for some refreshments afterwards. To extend the walk you could head west to visit Mawdesley and the historic Rufford Old Hall . The ancient hall has some beautiful gardens and nice walks along the Leeds and Liverpool Canal .
